about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, 7NR Retail Limited engaged in the business of trading of apparels in the wholesale and retail segments. 7NRR operates and manages four retail stores exclusively for kids apparel brand “Gini & Jony” across the state of Gujarat. It is also selling shirting and suiting under wholesale segment.

Currently company is supplying and marketing all sizes of Kids Garments in attractive designs with eco-friendly products. The company operates in two segments, Retail and Wholesale. The Retail segment trades in kids garments. This segment operates and manages four retail stores for kids apparel under the Gini & Jony brand. The Wholesale segment is involved in the wholesale trade of suitings, shirtings, and other textile products, as well as kids garments, such as uniforms and other fabrics. Currently 7NRR operates and manages four retail stores exclusively for kids apparel brand “Gini & Jony” across the state of Gujarat. It is also selling shirting and suiting under wholesale segment.

contactDetails.full_address: 7NR Retails Ltd, B-207 Titanium City Centre, Nr. Sachin Tower, Anand Nagar Road Satellite Ahmedabad -380 015

faqs.question: What is the 7NR Retails IPO?
faqs.answer:
7NR Retails IPO is a SME IPO of 1896000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹27 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on July 5, 2017, and closes on July 10, 2017.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in 7NR Retails IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in 7NR Retails IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in 7NR Retails IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in 7NR Retails IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the '7NR Retails IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When 7NR Retails IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The 7NR Retails IPO opens on July 5, 2017 and closes on July 10, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of 7NR Retails IPO?
faqs.answer: 7NR Retails IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for 7NR Retails IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in 7NR Retails IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
